sentence.Network_en: Silkworm culture is practised in order to get silk.
The unspoken mobilization order for the silkworm campaign reached everywhere and everyone.

sentence.Network_en: The Silkworm Goddess had been beneficent to the tiny village this year.

entry.def: A silkworm is the young form of a Chinese moth and it produces silk.

means.word_mean: 1. hairless white caterpillar of the Chinese silkworm moth; source of most commercial silk
2. larva of a saturniid moth; spins a large amount of strong silk in constructing its cocoon
